text: cu: TV scrEEN ( DWAYNE ‘THE ROCK’ JOHNSON is battling another titan of pr wrestling in a WWE CHAMPIONSHIP MATCH. The crowd chant in unison: “This is awesome! This is awesome!"

YOUNG ZAK (14) is watching the match on an aging TV ina working class British home. He is transfixed, copying The Rock’s every move, as if rehearsing. KAISER, the FAMILY PUPPY yaps at his heels. PAN TO: YOUNG SARAYA (RAYA) (13) -- sitting on the sofa, ignoring the TV, texting on her flip-phone. On the TV, the crowd goes wild -- as The Rock is awarded WWE CHAMPIONSHIP BELT. Young Zak mimics The Rock’s victory celebration, holding IMAGINARY ‘BELT’ aloft. Raya glances at Zak -- at the TV -- yawns -- takes the remote, switches it over to the TV show ‘Charmed.’
I’m watchin’ that!
It’s borin’.
It’s homework. That'll be me one day. They WRESTLE over the remote. Raya extends her free arm w the remote out of reach. Zak grabs her arm -- pulls it behind her back -- twists h
Owww! Zak! “ROWDY” RICKY KNIGHT enters -- 40s, MOHAWK, TATTOOS, BEE BELLY. He sees his son CHOKING his daughter.
Zak! What the fuck are you doin’?! Zak looks up.
If you’re gonna choke her, your arm should be here -- He adjusts Zak’s arm position -- Raya gags -- struggles i the choke hold.

Yesss! Now she’s in trouble! JULIA “SWEET SARAYA” KNIGHT walks in -- 40s, PALE COMPLEX RAVEN BLACK HAIR STREAKED WITH BLOOD-RED HIGHLIGHTS. She her daughter being choked by her son, while her husband l on.
What the bloody hell’s goin’ on?!
(gasping) He’s... choking... me!
Then what you gonna do about it? Raya escapes Zak’s hold by spinning under his arm and twisting it at the shoulder joint.
Aggghhhh!
Can I just say, you don’t half look pretty today, Saraya. Don’t she look pretty, Jules?
She's not just pretty on the outside, luv -- inside she’s got a heart of bloody gold. Raya releases her brother. Looks at her mum and dad.
What are you two wankers after?
No, fuck off! TRACK with Raya as she strides from the living room and h upstairs -- Ricky, Julia and Zak following her.
Chantelle bailed on me, Princess. I’m a girl down for the ladies match.
Your brothers have taught you all the moves.
No! I don’t wanna be a wrestler.
You'll love the buzz, darlin’. It’s more addictive than... coke, crack and heroin combined.
Have you done coke, crack and heroin? Beat.
Not combined...

Princess, if I gotta do refunds I’m buggered six ways till Sunday. We need you to do this -- for the family. The word ‘family’ always hits home. Raya pauses at the to the stairs -- looks back down at her family.
I can’t wrestle some random girl. I'll screw it up. Julia looks at Ricky. Zak pipes up.
What if you weren't wrestlin’ a random girl...? Off Raya’s quizzical look --

Zak -- now wearing a PINK WOMEN'S POWER RANGER outfit -- circles Raya in a TATTY WRESTLING RING beneath a home-mad banner that reads “WORLD ASSOCIATION OF WRESTLING (W.A.W. The TINY, HALF-EMPTY VENUE is a far cry from the WWE -- b the SMALL WORKING-CLASS CROWD buzz with anticipation. ANGLE ON: Julia and Ricky, watching expectantly from the of the room. The bell rings. Zak and Raya LOCK-UP.
(whispers ) I can’t do this.
It’s like a dance. Just follow me.
I’m gonna throw up.

Once they start cheerin’, you'll wanna do it forever... And with that he pulls away, bounces off the ropes -- dro Raya. The crowd CHEER. Raya gets up. Zak comes for her -- she ducks under his le bounces off the ropes -- CLOTHESLINES her brother to the The crowd may be tiny -- but they ROAR their approval. Raya stops momentarily, shocked -- looks at Zak, who smil at her. She smiles back. Ricky and Julia look on -- as the wave of adulation washe over Raya for the first time. Buoyed by the validation, Raya attacks her brother... the crowd CHEER... Julia and Ricky beam proudly. Brother and Sister lock up again -- Raya grinning now fr ear-to-ear. Zak smiles -- scoops up 13 YEAR OLD Raya -- BODY SLAMS he down -- -- and when she lands on her back -- she is SEVENTEEN YEA OLD. She nimbly leaps back up. It’s FOUR YEARS LATER (2009). Another SHABBY VENUE -- sam tatty ring, same home-made banner, now even rougher round edges. The crowd HECKLE AND CHEER as Raya and Julia exchange a flurry of MOVES, KICKS and THROWS. Aged 17, Raya resembles a younger version of her mother - same JET BLACK HAIR -- PALE COMPLEXION -- HEAVY EYE SHADO Julia wallops Raya. The crowd BOO AND HISS -- pure pantom

(to the crowd) Shuttup -- or I'll stick my foot so far up your arse, you'll be using my big toe as a tongue. LAUGHS AND HISSES from the crowd. Ricky, lurking on the ropes, distracts the Referee, allowing Julia free-reign t pummel Raya. The crowd HOLLER in protest. Suddenly -- THRASH METAL plays -- a GRAVELLY VOCALIST sin chants ‘ZODIAK! ZODIAK! over razor-blade guitars. The crowd CHEER as Zak -- now 18, 6’2", BUZZ CUT, CHERUBI SMILE -- bolts from the wings and slides into the ring. He kicks Ricky in the belly and against the ropes. The blue-collar crowd ROAR -- kids open-mouthed, parents transfixed -- all transported by the show. Raya ELBOW SMASHES Julia to the mat -- the audience erupt

Britani! Britani! Raya grandstands, milking the crowd like a pro, loving ev moment. A HANDFUL of die-hard Raya fans CHEER WILDLY for her, ho up signs. Among them, two YOUNGER, AWKWARD EMO TEENAGERS, HANNAH AND ELLIE. Zak comes for his dad --

Zak Attack! Zak Attack! Zak Attack! Zak brings Ricky down with a SWINGING LEG HOOK FIREMAN’S CARRY SLAM. Pins Ricky in a hold. Raya pins Julia. The Referee slides down next to them, pounds out the coun
One...! Two...! The crowd chant along: “One... two...”
Three! The crowd cheer -- Zak and Raya leap to their feet.
Your winners -- Zak Zodiak -- and Britani! Zak raises his sister’s hand -- they look at one another. winks at Raya “Good job”. She grins, relishing the applau
The Family are dismantling the ring.

The family carry the ring elements outside to a BEATEN-UP VAN branded with the W.A.W. insignia. Kaiser the dog, now fully grown, dances around their feet. I/E. VAN - NIGHT oO The rusting van rattles down GREAT YARMOUTH’S GOLDEN MILE creaking with old age. Ricky drives, Julia is holding up a mobile phone on speak In the rear, Zak and Raya lean in, listening keenly as an AMERICAN WOMAN answers.
World Wrestling Entertainment. Hutch Bernad’s office.
(into phone) ‘Ello, luv. It’s Ricky Knight callin’ again.
Ricky -- ?
-- Knight. Well, Bevis is my real name. Patrick Bevis. From the World Association of Wrestling?
The what?
The World Association of Wrestling. In Norwich.
Where?
Norwich, in England. Have you heard of England? Turn right at Greenland.
(calming him) Rick...
What’s this regarding, sir?
I sent Mr. Bernad a tape. Of my kids Zak Zodiak and Britani --
Well, in the ring I’m Britani. Out of the ring I’m Saraya.
That’s ‘cause in the ring I’m Saraya. You might have heard of me? Sweet Saraya Knight?
The easy way to remember it is: Julia is Saraya, Saraya is Britani, Pat Bevis is Ricky Knight and Zak Bevis is Zak Zodiak. Long silence.
You still there, luv?
I’m sure Mr. Bernad will contact you if necessary.
Has he watched the tape?
I’m sure Mr. Bernad will contact you if necessary.
Can you tell him we called again?
I’m sure Mr. Bernad will contact you if necessary.
Are you actually a real person?
Rick...
(into phone) Thanks for all your help, luv. He hangs up. The whole Knight clan sigh heavily, frustrat

- VAN travels down an A-ROAD - VAN passes a SIGN that says “WELCOME TO NORWICH - A FIN CITY”. On through various streets.  9 EXT, STREETS - NIGHT Oo 9 Zak and Raya stare out at the Norwich suburbs from the W. van. Zak notices a solitary TEENAGER, sitting alone on a PLAYGROUND SWING-SET. It’s a melancholy sight. 10 EXT. COUNCIL ESTATE - NIGHT oO 10 The van slows as it approaches a COUNCIL HOUSE -- the Kni home. Suddenly -- a DEBT COLLECTOR appears as if from nowhere, waving a LEGAL LOOKING LETTER.
Rick, he’s here again!
Oh, bollocks.
Drive! Drive! Ricky puts his foot down as the Debt Collector hollers:
Seven thousand, six hundred and fourteen pounds! The van speeds on --
You can’t run forever. We know who you are, Mr. Clondike!

(to Ricky) Mr. Clondike? Ricky shrugs. They start LAUGHING. The van drives on -- 11 EXT. NORWICH STREETS - DAY oO 11 Zak is behind the wheel of the van now, steering past the boarded-up shops and grafittied walls of a RUN-DOWN WORKI CLASS SUBURB. Kaiser peers out from the backseat. A group of Young Kids are lying flat on their backs on th pavement in front of a plywood ramp. An older boy sitting in a shopping trolley is being pushe another at break-neck speed towards the ramp.  12 13 10. It’s clearly about to end in tears when -- Zak rolls up i the van and BEEPS the horn. The TROLLEY stops, inches from the ramp and calamity. The kids see the van -- and their faces light up. They abando what they’re doing, start to climb aboard.

Raya hands out FLYERS to disinterested passers-by. She is helped by the TWO EMO TEENS who were in the crowd at the show: Hannah and Ellie -- both shy and reserved, now wear W.A.W. T-shirts. Most passers-by ignore them or brush them aside like flie

Have you got a leaflet for the wrestlin’ tonight? Hello, sorry, I have somethin’ for wrestlin’... A MAN IN A BUSINESS SUIT happily takes a flyer -- then promptly spits his gum into it. Raya watches, disheartene
PAULIE (15), THIN, WIRY, SHAVEN HEAD, is staring up at tw OLDER SKATER KIDS. They take drags on a joint.

Good, right? That’s the same shit Rihanna smokes. The Skater Kids take out their money as Paulie hands over little baggie of weed. Suddenly -- between the skater kid Paulie sees the W.A.W. van pull into view.

shit... He grabs the cash from the Skater Kids, bolts in the oppo direction -- as Zak leaps from the van, powers after him. Paulie rips across a street -- hurtles a low brick wall i a FRONT GARDEN. Zak hurtles after him. Paulie enters the open FRONT DOOR of a HOUSE -- zips stra through the lounge past a LITTLE GIRL watching TV -- out back door. Zak streaks through the lounge without stopping.  14 11. Paulie stumbles out into the back garden. An OLD LADY han washing backs away in fright. Paulie is up and over the BACK FENCE into an alley -- but Zak's right behind him -- barrels down onto him, drags hi backwards. The OLD LADY peers over the fence -- as Zak ri through Paulie’s pockets, pulls out a few bags of weed an pills.
That’s not mine.
Then why did you run?
You said I should do more cardio.
(waving baggie) Who's is it then?
I dunno. (re: Old Lady) Hers? Zak clips him around the head.
Owww.

Get in the van. The Old Lady watches, confused, as Zak pushes Paulie down lane, dumping the drugs into a OPEN DUST-BIN. Beat. The Old Lady moves to the bin, looks around, retrieves th stash. Scurries inside.
Raya, Hannah and Ellie are still handing out flyers. TWO ATTRACTIVE TOWNIE GIRLS (LATE TEENS) wearing high-str fashions sashay past.
S’cuse me. Have you ever been to live wrestlin’?  12. The TOWNIE’s look down their noses.
(sneery) No.
Who watches wrestling?
Stupid people who think it’s real. Hannah looks hurt.
Are you a wrestler?
No. (re: Raya) She is. She’s amazing.
But she’s a girl. (looking Raya up and down) Aren’t you?
(smirking) Is this, like, your costume?
No, this is me.
Seriously?
Wait, aren’t you from that weird family?
We're not weird.
Yeah. Your brother’s in jail. Raya flinches.
Why don’t you come tonight? It’s fun.  15 13.
I told you. We don’t like wrestling.
How do you know if you’ve never been?
I’ve never had rectal bleeding but I’m pretty sure I’m not a fan of that either. Her friend snickers. Raya steps toward them both menacing
Why don’t I stick her head up your arse, and you can find out? There is real threat in Raya’s eyes. The Townie’s scuttle off, unnerved. Then from a safe distance they call back -
(calling back) Freaks! Hannah and Ellie look rattled. Raya calls after the Towni

Yeah, we are. And proud of it! She grins at Hannah and Ellie, who smile back. The girls return to flyer-ing. Zak's theme tune -- THRASH METAL chorus of ‘ZODIAK! ZODIA plays as a ringtone. Raya pulls out her phone. Answers.

Hey, Zak... I/E. VAN - DAY ro} 15 Zak drives, Raya shot-gun, assorted local kids -- like ST CATS over-running the back seats -- sing along to the HEA METAL TRACK on the stereo. (say ‘ENTER SANDMAN’ by Metallica.)

“Take my hand... we're off to never- never land!" They stop at the lights.  16 14. Zak glances out of the window: he sees the TEENAGER again sitting alone on the SWING-SET. The van drives on past -- then does a U-TURN in the stree
Zak and Raya approach the teen, CALUM (16).
Hello, mate. My name’s Zak. This is my sister Saraya. What’s your name?
Calum.
Nice to meet ya. We run a wrestling school. Grapplers Gym. Lot of local people your age come down, if you fancy it? Calum shakes “no”.
No? Ever done any wrestling, mate?

Don’t take the piss. Calum picks up a WHITE CANE -- slowly walks away. We real - along with Zak and Raya -- that he is partially-sighted Zak looks at his sister. He scurries after Calum tenaciou Raya follows.
Wrestling is the nuts, mate. It doesn’t matter what problems you have in real life, when you’re in the ring you’re invincible.
Yeah. You can make the audience laugh, cry, boo, cheer. For ten minutes you feel like God. Calum stops, snaps at them --
I can't see!  17 15.
So? What else you gonna do today? Listen to porn? Calum walks off. Raya and Zak look at one another, watch go.

Slam! STOCKY PRO-WRESTLERS work out a routine in a TATTY held together with DUCK TAPE. Others use creaking WORK-OUT EQUIPMENT. We’re in a WINDOW-LESS WAREHOUSE brightened by GAUDY POST of GURNING WRESTLERS promoting previous W.A.W. clashes. Kaiser lies in a basket, one eye on Zak giving instructio The Strays in a SECOND RING. Zak has a Stray in a half-nelson -- drops him to the mat pins him.
Now, you lock off the whole of the body, ‘cause the objective is -- ?
Get a three count or a submission!
Good. Now you. The Strays begin to repeat the action. Paulie, standing behind Raya, grips her in a half-nelson.
Paulie -- have you got a hard on? Beat.
It’s not my fault, it does what it wants.
Uggghhh. Paulie! Raya spins out of the HALF-NELSON as Paulie covers his gr
Fifty press-ups.  18 16.
For having a stiffy?

No. For being sexually aroused by my sister. How desperate are you? More LAUGHTER, as Raya punches Zak in the arm. Paulie dro to the mat. Everyone begins to count his PUSH UPS -- as R sees something -- gestures -- Zak follows her gaze -- -- Calum is making his way into the gym. Zak smiles.
Ricky is sitting at a desk, speaking on an old LAND-LINE TELEPHONE. Julia sits doing paperwork.

(into phone) You're killin’ us, Glenn, it ain’t worth him makin’ the trip for that... Wait, let me ask him... A HULKING WRESTLER wearing a UNION JACK WAISTCOAT is sitt next to Ricky. Ricky picks up a METAL TRASH CAN LID.
Will you take one o’ them in the face?
Dunno. What’s it like? Ricky smacks him in the face with the lid. Union Jack nod unfazed.
(into phone) Yeah, that’s fine... Hang on. Ricky pulls a BOWLING BALL out of a box, stands above Uni Jack, drops the BALL in his groin. Jack doubles over in p Then, in agony, gives a thumbs up.
(into phone) Yeah, he’1ll do a bowlin’ ball in the bollocks. How much...? Glenn, pay him what he’s worth! (MORE )
(resigned) Okay. He’1l be there. He hangs up.
Sixty quid. Union Jack rolls his eyes.
I know, I know. Union Jack gets up, exits -- as Julia finishes counting takings.
How much last night?
Four hundred.
Bloody hell. If things don’t pick up soon I‘ll have to go back to thievin’.
I don’t care how desperate we get, you are never going back to thievin’. We’ll make Zak do it. And Raya can go on the game.
They LAUGH, share a kiss.
Zak helps Calum into the ring.
Everyone. This is Calum.
Hello, Calum. Nearby, a pro-wrestler slams onto a mat. Calum flinches.
You're okay, mate. Calum remains tense.  18.
Can you see anything at all?
Outlines.
Can you see me?
I can see a blob.
Close enough. Everyone LAUGHS -- including Calum.
How’s he gonna wrestle if he can’t see?
You can see. Doesn't help you. Everyone LAUGHS again. Raya whispers to Zak.
Seriously, how is he?
No idea.
Courtney! Everyone looks round. COURTNEY, (18), PRETTY, QUIET, has entered. She nods to Zak. He nods back, looks to his sister...
Can me and Courts have a word... 20 MOMENTS LATER -—— 20 Through a window we WATCH -- but don’t HEAR -- as Zak and Courtney share something with Raya. Her reaction is WILD SURPRISE.
They can take us as they find us, or not at all.  21 19.
Raya sets the table. Ricky is sat in his WIFE-BEATER VEST reading THE DAILY STAR. Julia blitzes TV DINNERS in the microwave, arguing with Z
I’m not asking you to bow and scrape, it’s just Courtney's parents are quite --
Posh.
Her dad is teetotal.
So am I.
Yeah, but he’s teetotal out of choice, not ‘cause he’s an alcoholic.
Oh, la-de-dah.
He just wants to make a good impression when they get here.
Make a good impression, how?
Can you put a shirt on for dinner?
(incredulous) How fuckin’ posh are they?!
Why’s a posh bird goin’ out with a wrestler?
‘Cause he told her he’s gonna be rich and famous.  22 20.
No. ‘Cause I’m kind and considerate... except in the bedroom, when I’m an animal.
Ugghhh! That’s my boy! Learned from the master.
And can we keep the effin’ and jeffin’ to a fuckin’ minimum? Courtney’s dad don’t use cusswords.
Who is her dad? The Archbishop of fuckin’ Canterbury?
Please, can we just try and act normal? For Courtney’s sake. Off Julia and Ricky’s nods --

The Family are sitting around the dining table eating din Ricky is now wearing a Norwich City soccer shirt. Zak is next to Courtney. Opposite them are DAPHNE and HUGH -- a MIDDLE-AGED, MIDDL CLASS, MIDDLE-ENGLAND COUPLE -- wildly out of place besid the tattooed and pierced Knight family.
(best behavior) Can I say, on behalf of my husband and I, that we are delighted to finally make your acquaintance.
Oh... well, likewise. Julia winks at Zak -- who smiles, pleased.
More expensive sparkling water, Hugh?
Thank you.  21. Ricky pours water for Hugh.
Courtney says you’re in stocks and shares, Hugh?
For my sins. And... you’re all wrestlers?
All of us, mate, that’s right.
Who exactly enjoys wrestling?
Loads of people, luv.
Just no one we know, dear.
Isn’t it all fake? The Knight family bristle at the word.
If it was all fake, Daph, would I have broken my leg three times? My collar bone twice?
Would me elbow bend like this? He shows them his elbow. It’s lumpy, mis-shapen, and bend a weird angle. Daphne and Hugh wince.
That’s nothin’. You should see his cock.
Mum...
Sorry. (to Daphne and Hugh) His penis.
How did you get into wrestling?  22.
(grinning) Oh, this is such a romantic story. Do you want to tell it?
No, go ahead.
Well, when I met Rick I was thinkin’ of killing meself.
She wanted to top herself, yeah.
I'd been abused and livin’ on the streets.
And I'd done eight years of prison. Zak rolls his eyes. Hugh and Daphne glance at one another taken aback.
Prison? For... what?
Mainly violence.
Mainly violence, yep.
And a bit of armed robbery. Zak looks at Raya: “not this”. Daphne and Hugh shift uncomfortably. Flick a glance at Courtney: who are these people?

Me and my mob come back from doin’ a job in London. And Julia come in and saw all the cash and sawn-off shot-guns on the kitchen table. And I knew from the look in her eyes that if I didn’t give all that up there and then, I’d lose her forever.  23.
He walked out on his gang that night -- never done another dishonest day in his life.
And the rest of ‘em are all banged up now, aren’t they? Or dead.
One of them had his face blown off.
(correcting) Half his face.
Some people find religion. Me and Ricky found wrestlin’. Julia and Ricky look at one another.
It was our salvation, wasn’t it? They start making out like teenagers. Hugh and Daphne watch, uncomfortable.
(to Hugh) That’s a romantic story, isn’t it, dad?
Yes... considering a man got his face blown off.
Half his face. Zak senses Daphne and Hugh’s discomfort. The PHONE RINGS. Ricky answers.
‘Ello...? This is he... Yeah, they’re here, hang on... RICKY puts the phone on speaker.
Am I speaking to Zak and Britani?  24.
Yep./Hello.
My name is Hutch Bernad, I’m calling from WWE. Zak and Raya look at one another.
We were very impressed by your tape. In April we’re bringing Smackdown to the 02 in London and we'd like you both to come down -- and try out for us. Silence.
Hello?

Would you excuse us while we check our diaries? He MUTES the call. Zak and Raya look at one another -- th at their parents -- then back at one another -- -- and then ERUPT! WHOOP -- HOLLER -- HUGS -- HIGH-FIVES. Zak kisses Courtne Ricky kisses Julia. Even Kaiser BARKS like he’s won the lottery. Daphne and Hugh look blank. Zak shushes everyone. Clicks the phone off MUTE.
(super calm) Yes, we think we can clear a space in our schedule.
Good. We'll be in touch. See you both there.
Thank you. The call ends. The celebrations pick right up again -- un Daphne pipes up --  23 25.
Excuse me? What is the WWE?
(incredulous)

Daphne and Hugh recoil. INT. KNIGHT HOUSE - LIVING ROOM - NIGHT oO 23 The Knight's are screening a CLASSIC WWE match on TV for Daphne and Hugh. On screen, two female WWE Divas do battl The crowd chant: “This is awesome!"
For any wrestler, making it big, it's this -- in America, with the WWE.
World Wrestling Entertainment. Biggest wrestlin' company in the world.
America is where the money is, where the stardom is.
We get there, we’ll be travellin’ the world, on private jets, performin’ in front of millions. You can make millions.
Movies even.
You should see her in the ring. It's like watchin’ a brilliant ballet dancer. And the biggest buzz I get is when people say to me, “Don't she look just like you?”

When they’re stars and they come back, we’ll have full houses every night, shift a ton of merchandise, expand the trainin’ school, sky's the limit. (to Hugh) You should buy shares in us, mate.  26. Hugh LAUGHS FAINTLY.
Seriously, I’ve got the paperwork here.
Dad...
(to Zak) Do you think you’1ll get signed?
Signed? I been trainin’ him for this before he had fur on his bollocks. Nads. Knackers. Testicles. Raya points to a framed photo of another YOUNG MAN dresse a Zebra-print leotard.
Our step-brother Roy did the try- outs last year.
Oh. Is Roy in America now?
No. He's in prison.
Oh. And why’s he --?
Mainly violence. Mainly violence. Daphne and Hugh look unnerved. Zak steps in.
This is not the only exciting news today, is it? She takes Zak’s hand. Everyone looks at them expectantly. COURTNEY (CONT’D) I've decided to quit college... and move in with Zak.
Since when?
Since... I got pregnant.  27. Both sets of parents stare, dumbstruck.
Fuccckkkkkkkkk! Everyone stares at Hugh.
(to Hugh) Don’t worry. The baby’s mine.
Raya, Zak and Courtney sit at a table across from a BIG G in PRISON GARB. This is ROY (28). He has his hand on Courtney’s growing baby-bump.
Did you feel him kick?
Practicing his drop-kicks in there. He's gonna be a wrestler.
Please God, no. Everyone LAUGHS.
Have you picked a name?
We're thinking about Kayden.
I love it.
I need a name, too.
You're not pregnant?
No. WWE have got a Britani. I have to chose a new name before the try- out. Any ideas? An immediate barrage from the brothers.  28.
Scrubber, Slutbucket, Trollop, The Norwich Bicycle, Margaret Snatcher Sabrina The Teenage Bitch
Moobs McGee.
Great. Thanks boys. The siblings laugh.
Roy... can I ask you something?
‘Course you can.
Your mum said you did the try-outs last year?
That’s right.
So why are you in here? The siblings stops smiling.
Courts...
I don’t wanna be rude, but Zak won’t tell me.
Courtney... Roy looks at Zak, then at Raya. They all shift uncomforta Courtney stares defiantly. Looks at Raya for support.
She's havin’ your kid, Zak. She's family now. Zak takes this in. Exchanges a look with Roy. Roy takes a breath, addresses Courtney:
I did the try-outs. The WWE didn't want me. I took it hard. (MORE )

Started drinkin'. One night I'm in a boozer, some geezers come in, I picked a fight with 'em. No reason, just went at it. One bloke comes at me, I picked up a fire extinguisher... Roy looks down, ashamed.
Put him in a coma for six weeks.
(hand to her mouth) Jesus...
He's fine now. Courtney leans back in her seat, shocked. She looks at Za worried.
Don't worry, love. Zak ain't like me. I’m the nutcase. He’s the strong one in the family. Courtney looks to Raya, who nods in confirmation.

Really. Zak’s got his head screwed on. Him and Moobs McGee here. Courtney smiles, accepting the reassurance. CLOSE ON: Raya, nodding, but a note of disquiet on her fa EXT. BRITANNIA ROAD —- NORWICH HILLSIDE - DAY 25 PAN FROM: The BRICK FACADE of the 19th century PRISON, ac the skyline of Norwich. Zak and Raya race each other up the steep hill. Zak wins, Raya close behind. They suck in air, framed by the their hometown in the distance. Zak notices Raya’s thousand yard stare.
You okay?
‘Course.  30.
I know when you're lying.
Just... thinking about Roy. And the trial.
What about it?
If we get signed, we'll have to leave all this.
And move to a mansion in Florida.
Four thousand miles away.
From a council house in Norwich.
From mum and dad. Everyone. Zak studies his sister. She looks anxious.
What’s this about?
Nothin’. Zak reads her nervousness. Pulls her close, reassuringly.
You're gonna smash it tomorrow.
How do you know?
You're a Knight -- wrestling's in your blood.
That's not good. That makes it sound like... hepatitis.
It is. You're riddled with wrestlin' -- and there's no cure.  26 31. Raya LAUGHS. She pushes Zak and he stumbles back, giving a head start, as she races off, and we --

Camera following Zak and Raya through a TUNNEL into -- INT. ARENA - pay [J 26 The sibling’s eyes widen as they take in the VAST AUDITOR The 20,000 seats are empty -- but the STAGE is already be set for tonight's WWE rumble. BANNERS and BRANDING are be hoisted into place -- technicians adjust lights -- camera are trained on the WRESTLING RING in the middle of the fl Zak is open-mouthed with wonder.

So cool. Can you imagine this place, full, twenty-thousand people -- Zodiak! Zodiak! Raya looks around the vast auditorium, overwhelmed by it’ scale. She sees the competition limbering up -- EIGHT GUYS, shoulders bulging, abs shredded.

You're the only girl. Raya considers this -- anxiety rising. Zak notices some movement up in the stands. Nudges Raya, upwards -- she looks -- DWAYNE ‘THE ROCK’ JOHNSON is talking and bro-hugging some fellow WWE STARS. Raya looks at Zak: “holy shit.”
Two lines -- fall in! A VOICE reverberates around the vast arena. It belongs to
The Contenders line up in formation. Hutch, flanked by two ASSISTANT TRAINERS, studies them li DRILL SERGEANT.  27 32.
Who is here because they want to be a WWE superstar? All hands raise.
Okay. Then let's address the elephant in the room. He turns to a HUGE HEAVEYSET DUDE in a wrestling leotard.
How's it going? Everyone laughs.
What are the odds are of becoming a WWE superstar? Heavyset Dude shrugs “I don’t know”.

The same as you ordering salad for lunch -- zero. (to group) You have better odds of making it in the NFL, the NBA or the Soccer Premier League -- than of becoming a WWE superstar. Odds are you will never play a stadium. Never get on TV. Never win a Title Belt. Hutch holds up a WWE Championship Belt and a Diva’s Championship Belt. He gestures to another Contender.
Most of you will be as disappointed as this guy’s wife on their wedding night. So let’s get this over with.
SCHLAMM! A BLACK ADONIS hits the mat hard. He and Zak battle in the ring. Raya watches Hutch as he studies Zak. She looks up at Dwayne, who chats with his fellow wrestle eyes on the trials.
- Hutch scrutinises as the contenders run in circles arou the base of the ring, jump up, then squat down to touch t floor. - Side-to-side leaps over heavy weight bags at rapid pace - Forward rolls.

Raya and Zak give a virtuoso display of CLASSIC BRITISH WRESTLING TECHNIQUE. PUSH IN ON: Hutch, studying them. UP IN THE STANDS: Dwayne watches attentively. Zak and Raya lock up. Zak whispers to his sister.

Play everything out more. And sell your snaps harder. Raya absorbs, nods. They break apart. Zak takes Raya in a ‘pigsfoot’ -- slaps her around the fa She administers Zak's advice -- snapping her head back dramatically. Hutch observes.

- Hutch shouting abuse, scanning them for weaknesses. - Zak and Raya BOUNCE against the ropes, drop to do a pre up, jump over a weight bag, into another press up. - Hutch watches as one contender gives up, staggers to a trash can, vomits inside.
Zak drops a LONG HAIRED DUDE with his ‘Zak Attack’ finish move. Pins him for the ‘win’. A shimmer of satisfaction crosses Hutch’s face.  34.
Nice finisher. That your move?
(nodding) The Zak Attack. Hutch nods, impressed.
The Contenders hang on the ropes, exhausted, as Hutch pro in front of them.

Becoming a WWE Superstar is all about winning. But not a match -- who wins, who loses, the producers decide that before you ever step in the ring. What you have to win... is the crowd. What do we call winning the crowd?
Zak raises a hand.
Going over.
Going over. And no one’s ever gone over bigger than a man we’re lucky to have with us today. He gestures to the stands.
Dwayne... I’m puttin’ you on the spot... but would you show ‘em how it’s done...? Dwayne looks at the other pro’s in the stands, who gee hi into it. The contenders applaud as he makes his way down.
Dwayne holds the mic, throws back his head, raises the mi his lips.  35.
Finally... the Rock has come back to Lon-don! Everyone CLAPS wildly. Zak grins and CHEERS with unbridle glee. Dwayne points at a Contender.
What’s your name? The Contender opens his mouth to speak -- but Dwayne cuts off.
(interrupting)

head_text.subj: IT DOESN'T MATTER WHAT YOUR NAME

text: IS! The Rock says know your role and shut your mouth. The Rock is standing here -- like the man and a half he is -- ready to do to you exactly what he does best and that's lay the smack down on your candy ass! Everyone APPLAUDS. Dwayne smiles --
We call that what? Zak's hand is in the air.
A promo.
Dwayne’1l tell ya, apart from your skill in the ring, promos are how you connect with the crowd.

Right. This is a fictionalized world but the fans can tell if you're being fake. You go over when the fans connect with the real you. The Rock is me, but with the bass, the treble, the volume dialled way up. Hutch points at Zak.
What’s your name?  36.
Zak Zodiak.
Zak Zodiak? What are you, a stripper at a gay bar? LAUGHS from the other wannabes.
Twenty seconds. Why are you here? Go...

When I was three years old, I could name every WWE wrestler just by looking at his boots; I’ve wanted to be one of ‘em ever since. I eat, sleep and dream wrestlin’. I’m passionate, I’m determined and I’m the toughest bastard in the room. Oh, I shouldn’t curse, we have ladies present -- He turns to Raya -- leans past her to the LONG HAIRED DUD
Sorry, miss. Everyone LAUGHS. LONG HAIRED DUDE looks embarrassed. Dway LAUGHS, leads the applause. Hutch turns to Raya.
What’s your name? Raya hesitates.
Er... Paige.
Paige? Whadda you, wrestle -- or sell perfume at the mall? LAUGHTER.
Why are you here? Go!
I’m here because I’m the best, you're just one of the rest. (MORE )
If you can’t stand the heat, get out of the kitchen because you can run but you can’t hide --
Stop! Stop! He waves his hands, closing her down.
What did Dwayne just say the fans connect with?
The... real you. Hutch pushes himself into her face.

Then why you speakin’ in cliches? Go again, show us the real you -- or you can get on your broomstick and fly your ass home to Hogwarts. All eyes turn to Raya. Dwayne looks at her, expectant. Long pause. She eyeballs Hutch. TITTERS.
When are you gonna drop this army drill-sergeant bollocks? You’re not trainin’ us to fight in Iraq, you're trainin’ us to fight in spandex.

My whole family are wrestlers, I’ve been wrestling since before I was born. Literally. My mum was seven months pregnant with me and didn’t even realize, so she was still gettin’ in the ring every night, which meant I was, too. Dwayne leans forward, intrigued.
Sending me home is not a threat, I'll go back to fightin’ with my family and be happy doin’ it. I got options -- but if this is my competition --  30 38. She gestures to the other dudes.
-- you sure as shit don’t. She leans into Hutch’s face.

Oh. And your breath stinks. So either brush your teeth -- or stop kissin’ Dwayne Johnson's ass. Everyone looks from Hutch to Dwayne for a reaction. Dwayn smiles. Shares a look with Hutch -- who moves on to the n contender, as we --
The Contenders wait anxiously, in silence. Zak paces nervously. Raya chews her nails. They meet each others gaze but say nothing: too much at stake for chit-c
Is that true? Your whole family are wrestlers? They turn. It’s Dwayne, with his team.
(shocked) Fuck me dead, bury me pregnant. Dwayne raises an eyebrow.
She means yes.
Mine, too.
I know. Your granddad was High Chief Peter Maivia. Your dad was “Soulman” Rocky Johnson, he was in the first black tag team to win the World Championship.
He’s a huge fan.
Massive.  39.
He’s been a fan since you had hair. Dwayne raises another eyebrow. Looks at them both.
Well, good luck to ya. He begins to head off.
Can I ask you a favour? Dwayne turns back.
Don’t put him on the spot.
He won’t mind. As we’re both from wrestlin’ families, would you --
-- vouch for you? Sorry...
No, no. I was wonderin’ if you could ‘Rock-Bottom’ me?
I... don't really do that either.
Please. One of my all time dreams is to be Bottomed by The Rock.
If I Bottom you, people will see. I‘1l have to Bottom them.
No one's lookin’. Please, just a quick Bottom, I'll be out of your hair.
Not hair. Don’t say hair. Dwayne considers.
Okay, quick. Ready?  31 40. Zak nods. Dwayne side-slams Zak to the floor. Zak winces “Bagh”.
You okay?
Car keys. Back pocket.
Good luck, guys. I’1l be keeping tabs on you.
Thank you.
Can you call me a jabroni? But Dwayne is gone. Zak and Raya grin at one another, as helps him up.
Raya and Zak -- amidst the other Contenders -- stand in l in silence, trying not to betray their nerves. Hutch stands before them --

We will be offering four of you a contract with WWE. You'll join us out in Florida at our development division, NXT. For the rest of you - - I’m afraid -- this is the end of the line. Raya reaches for her brother’s hand, squeezes it tightly.
The first person chosen is -- CLOSE ON the contenders, holding their breath -- wishing praying.
Hugh Jabs. The LONG HAIRED DUDE punches the air in celebration.
But change your ring name.  41. Long Haired Dude cuts his celebration short.
The second person is -- Captain Kronos. A GERMANIC BEEFCAKE drops to his knees, thanking the Gods
The third person is... Zak and Raya breathe deeply.
Paige.
Are you fuckin’ serious?
I’m fuckin’ serious.
Omigod, omigod, omigod. She turns to her brother -- SCREAMS SILENTLY -- hugs him. hugs her back.
And the last person is -- CLOSE ON: Zak, never more focused. Time slows down -- TV talent show tension.
-- Joey Midnight. The BLACK ADONIS nods, kisses the crucifix around his nec Zak is paralysed -- uncomprehending. Raya, too.

Thank you all for coming today. Hutch and his Colleagues walk away -- winners and rejects slowly disperse. Zak can’t move -- stares blankly -- Raya doesn’t know wha do -- or say. Finally, Zak breaks the silence. Turns to her.
I’m proud of you.  32 33 42.
This is not right... She starts to run after Hutch --
Raya... -- but she is gone.

Long circular corridor -- buzz of pre-show activity. Raya dashes past technicians, wrestlers, assistants, searching for Hutch -- dips her head into empty rooms -- can’t find him. Zak trails some distance behind her -- still shell-shocke
Hutch is climbing into an SUV. Suddenly Raya appears, Zak behind her.
You have to take my brother.
I made my choices.
You made a mistake.
I don’t make mistakes.
Then how do you explain that goatee?
Raya...
If my brother’s not going, neither am I.
Raya!  43.
Is that a threat?
Yes. No.
Every week two thousand people beg me for the chance I just gave you. I have options. You don’t. So you have ten seconds to tell me: do you want this or not?
Not without Zak.
Eight seconds.
Coach, she wants it... Raya and Hutch lock eyes. Stand-off.
Six...
Raya...
Five...
You're not just doing this for you -- it’s for the family. Family. That word again.
...three...
Raya!
I want this. Zak breathes a sigh of relief. Hutch stares at Raya defiantly.  34 35

See you in Florida. He climbs into the SUV -- and it roars away. Raya watches go, turns -- to see Zak wandering away. I/E. VAN - EVENING oO 34 Zak and Raya drive home in silence. Raya glances at her brother -- but he stares only at the road. She knows ther nothing she can say.

Ricky, Julia, Courtney, the Strays and the Pros are waiti anxiously. Car doors illuminate the gym. Everyone rises to their fee Doors slam outside. Beat. Zak and Raya walk in -- greeted by a wall of expectant fa
Well -- ?
Saraya’s in... I’m not. Ricky’s shoulders slump. Julia, never at a loss for somet to say, cannot find the right words. Even Kaiser sits silently. Zak breaks the ice.
Why are you all so quiet? Come on! My little sister is the first eighteen-year-old English girl signed by the WWE -- ever! He begins to CLAP AND WHISTLE.
Champagne! Paulie, go down the shop and nick some champagne. Taking their lead from Zak, everyone else joins in the applause. Courtney kisses Zak, gives him a hug.  36 37 38 45.
You alright?

(nodding) Fine. Julia hugs her daughter -- then gently touches the back o Zak's head -- whispers in his ear. Ricky gives Raya a bear hug, looks Zak in the eye -- shak his hand manfully -- pats him on the shoulder. The Strays crowd around Raya to congratulate her. Zak watches, stoically, as they hoist her on their should and parade her around the gym.

Clouds drag themselves across a grey sky. INT. RAYA’S BEDROOM - DAY 37 Raya is finishing packing her SUITCASE. On her bed sits a vintage ULTIMATE WARRIOR WRESTLING BUDD CUDDLY TOY from the 90s. Raya picks up Ultimate Warrior, him in her case. She looks around her TEENAGE ROOM for the last time. Look PHOTOS on a shelf: the family in wrestling costumes, stri FIGHTING POSES; Raya with Zak, wearing his PINK POWER RAN OUTFIT -- from the night Raya first got in the ring. She puts both pictures in her case -- and snaps it closed
CLOSE ON ZAK -- sitting on the old BENCH PRESS, taking dr on a cigarette. Julia appears at the back door -- Raya behind her.
Zak, we're off.  46.
(waking from his thoughts) Huh?
To the airport. Chop chop...
I can't come right now...
Your sister's leavin’ for America.
I've got a ton of stuff to do...
What do you have to do?
Stuff.
What stuff?
Mum, it's fine, if he's busy... Julia mutters, shakes her head, walks off inside. Brother and sister look at one another.
Have a safe flight... and... good luck and everything...
And you... with the baby, and... Zak nods. They embrace. Stilted. Awkward. Raya turns to go.
Don't cry. She turns back.

At the airport. If you cry, mum'll start -- and if you see her cryin’, you won't wanna go. When you walk to the plane, just put your hood up -- and don't look back.  39 40 4l 47. Raya nods, appreciating the advice. She leaves. Zak finds himself all alone.
Raya hugs Roy goodbye.
From an UPSTAIRS WINDOW, Zak silently watches as the van carries his sister away.
Ricky and Julia look on as Wrestlers and Strays say goodb to Raya. Hannah nudges Ellie.

Go on... Ellie nervously hands Raya a rolled piece of paper. Raya unfolds it -- it’s a beautifully detailed, Manga- influenced, hand-drawn ILLUSTRATION of Raya, posing on th top rope, pumping her fist and smiling, as she holds alof the WWE DIVA CHAMPIONSHIP BELT. Fan-art at it’s finest. Raya -- overwhelmed -- admires the picture.
You drew this? Ellie nods.
It's you, winning the Diva's title. Raya smiles.
It’s amazing. Thank you. She thanks them with a hug. ANGLE ON: Ricky and Julia.
She's ain’t comin’ back.
‘Course she's comin’ back. She's goin’ out to work, not die.
She's goin’ away to live.
It's gonna be alright. You just gotta be strong.
I'm trying, Rick.
Once the gates close, you'll have a good ol' cry. She's gotta walk on that plane on her own. At least we go home together. Raya approaches her parents.
I'm really scared now. I wish Zak was comin’.
We all do, luv.
Look after him.
He’ll be fine. He’s the tough one in the family. Julia starts to tear up. Raya is emotional now, too.
Go and get 'em baby, okay? You're amazing. You're absolutely amazing.
You're gonna be a star, Princess -- you're gonna put our family name on the map.
Which family name?
Either’s fine. Raya smiles.  42 43 44 49. Paulie lifts her carry-on onto her shoulder. She gives hi peck on the cheek and he steps back, grinning. Raya moves towards the DEPARTURE GATE.
So long, luv. We’re proud of ya.

(waving to everyone) I love you. I love you. Julia is crying hard. Ricky puts an arm around her. ANGLE ON: Raya, as she puts up her hood -- trying to igno the tears streaming down her mother’s face. ORLANDO, FLORIDA -- ESTABLISHING SHOTS oO 42 POV from a CAR WINDOW -- endless blue-sky -- palm trees - sun glistening off Lake Eola. Raya takes in the alien landscape from the window of a TA Like Dorothy landing in Oz, her world seems to have gone black and white to Technicolor. She’s a long way from hom

Raya enters through a gate, takes in the SWIMMING POOL. THREE BEAUTIFUL WOMEN sunbathe. JERI-LYNN (Southern-belle pneumatic Playmate-type with fa boobs), MADISON (former dancer) and KIRSTEN (statuesque blonde). Kirsten looks up at Raya - flashes pearl blue eyes and gleaming white teeth -- as she dives elegantly into the p Raya hauls her bags up a staircase to a SECOND FLOOR WALK INT. RAYA’S APARTMENT - DAY 44 Raya unlocks the door, enters, takes in her new corporate clean home.  45 46 50.

STATE OF THE ART training facility -- pristine WRESTLING RINGS branded with WWE NXT logos -- an even longer way fr the W.A.W. From the ring, Hutch explains a routine, demonstrated at speed by his TWO COLLEAGUES. Raya’s eyes wander -- she takes in the other new recruits EIGHT MEN, THREE WOMEN. The BOYS: LONG HAIRED DUDE, GERMANIC BEEFCAKE and BLACK ADONIS from the London trials -- plus an assortment of bo builders, college quarterbacks, all-American high school heroes and meathead farm-boys. The GIRLS from the pool: JERI-LYNN, MADISON and KIRSTEN. Each has the bombshell physique and pin-up good-looks of archetypal WWE DIVA -- SEXY OUTFIT, MANICURED NAILS, RICH TANS, COIFFURED HAIR. Raya looks down at her own TATTY BLACK LEGGINGS, FADING R T-SHIRT and SPLIT ENDS. Her porcelain-skin and Goth-rock mark her out -- as the runt of the litter. She looks up -- finds Kirsten staring at her. Kirsten fla a smile and a mouthful of gleaming white teeth. Raya smil back. ANGLE ON: Hutch’s colleagues, as they now demo the sequen at full speed. Applause. Hutch turns to the Class.
Everyone got it?
Yes, Coach! Hutch points to Raya and Madison.
You and you. Show me.

Raya and Madison lock up. They repeat the routine. Raya f through the memorised moves effortlessly.  51. They approach the final moves -- when Raya improvises -- Madison is not expecting it -- reacts slowly -- takes Ray FOOT IN THE FACE. Madison’s nose explodes in a cloud-burst of red.
Agghh!!!
Omigod, I’m so sorry! Raya rushes to help Madison -- who angrily pushes her awa clutching her bloodied nose. Kirsten clicks her fingers, points to a towel -- Jeri-Lynn grabs it, hands it to her.
(to Jeri-Lynn) Call the doc. Hutch jumps into the ring -- Kirsten follows, hands him t towel to smother the bleeding. Hutch examines Madison's n
It’s not broken. Someone call the doc...
On the way.
(to Madison) I’m so sorry. Hutch spins on Raya, angry. The class all turn to watch.
Did I tell you to add your own moves?
(apologetic) I’m sorry, I thought she’d know what I was doing.
Did I tell you to add your own moves? Raya shakes her head “no”.
Then why did you?  52.
Your routine seemed kind of... basic.
Basic?
My step-brother taught me that stuff when I was, like, ten.
Your step-brother?
Roy Bevis. (off Hutch’s blank look) The Zebra Kid?
(US pronunciation) The Zeebra Kid?
(correcting) Zebb-ra. Hutch steps forward, looms in Raya’s face. Raya nods.

I don’t care if you were taught by the Zebra Kid, the Elephant Man or the fuckin’ Lion King -- this ain't the ass-crack of England anymore, this is the NXT. If you want any chance of makin’ it on to the Main Roster, you do what I say, when I say it, or you can fuck off back home to The Addams Family. Understood?
I’m just sayin’, I --
Yes, Coach. Hutch walks away.  53. Raya finds everyone eyeing her suspiciously.
One minute she’s like, “I’m an expert” --
Kirsten and Jeri-Lynn are sunbathing.

-- and the next minute she’s “Oh sorry, it was an accident”. So it’s like, are you an expert or not? (then) I can’t understand half of what she says. She sounds like she has a dick in her mouth... but not ina good way. Raya appears. Jeri-Lynn stops speaking. Flashes a smile.
Sorry about before. With Madison. It was an accident. I didn’t realize until, like, two months ago she was just a cheerleader.
Oh yeah?
Yeah. Lot of times the WWE hire cheerleaders or models, girls who just wanna jiggle their tits and ass, you know, get famous -- instead of girls who’ve actually wrestled before.
Where did you wrestle before?
W.A.W. in England. I was Ladies Champion, Tag Team Champion and Ladies Hardcore Champion. What about you?
I was a cheerleader. Beat.  48 49 50 54.
Cool. (to Jeri-Lynn) And what about --
Model. Raya nods. What can she say...? Kirsten flashes her thousand-watt smile.
Well... nice to meet you. She gets up, walks towards her apartment. Jeri-Lynn smile too, follows. Off Raya’s sinking expression --

The SUN burns down on The Class as Hutch puts them throug merciless BLOW UP DRILLS: bellybusters -- atomic sit ups squatting with KETTLE BELLS -- suplexing WEIGHT BAGS. Hutch shouts abuse -- hollers commands -- scanning them f weaknesses. Black Adonis vomits. Shamefully buries it und sand. CLOSE ON: Raya, pushing herself, sweating hard. She locks eyes with Hutch, as he studies her.
CLOSE ON: Courtney sweating hard, too -- deep into LABOUR Medical staff attend to her -- Zak watches. Courtney reac out, grabs his hand.

The Class race along the beach in a BURDEN RUN, heavy sandbags slung over their shoulders. It’s gruelling work. Raya feels eyes on her. It’s Kirsten: she flashes her thousand watt smile, seemingly unfazed by the brutal regi - powers forward -- an unspoken challenge to Raya to keep Raya, sweating hard, pushes herself to catch up...  51 52 53 55.
Zak is handed his new-born son KAYDEN. He holds him awkwardly, stares into his eyes. Panic more than joy.

Kirsten is in the lead, Raya behind her -- followed by Je Lynn, then Madison. Kirsten reaches a HEAVY TRACTOR TIRE. Dumps her sandbag - wrestles her tire upwards. Raya catches up -- struggles to get under her tire. Sweat hard, she gives herself an extra boost -- flipping her ti over -- trying to catch up with Kirsten. Jeri-Lynn is close behind. Raya soldiers through pain but Kirsten powers on -- gives FINAL PUSH. Crosses the ‘finish line’ -- victorious. Raya, lungs working overtime, arrives behind her in secon place. She drops, exhausted. Finds Kirsten staring at her with steel-cold eyes. Jeri-Lynn slumps down next to them. Madison is way behind, still doggedly trying to hoist her tire. It’s a losing battle. Hutch hollers at her.
Flip it!
It’s too hard...

How you gonna throw a girl round a ring every night if you can’t even flip a tire? Now flip it! Madison shakes her head, drops the tire, waves her hands defeat, collapses to the ground, sucking air. Raya watches as Hutch shakes his head in contempt.

Tatty trainers pounding down a pavement. A blur of limbs faces. Paulie runs for his life, pursued by TWO TWENTY- SOMETHING STREET TOUGHS.  54 56. The Toughs are gaining on Paulie as he dodges a car -- te across the industrial estate towards the W.A.W. gym.

Zak (blindfolded) is counting steps with Calum from one s of the ring to the other. They reach one side, turn, walk back. Strays work-shop in the other ring. Paulie BARRELS through the door, lungs in overdrive. A Stray nudges Zak and he lifts his blindfold -- to see t Toughs skid into the doorway. Zak quickly assesses the situation.
Can I help you?
No. (re: Paulie) We just need our friend here.
He’s busy.
With what?
Hand-washing our jock-straps. The Toughs stride towards Paulie. Union Jack steps toward them, intimidatingly. The Toughs back down.
(to Paulie) Stay off our fuckin’ patch. They leave. Zak turns to Paulie.
Empty your pockets.
I ain’t got nothin’...
Empty your pockets.  57. Paulie turns out his pockets -- he hands over some little baggies of weed. Zak points to the door.
Get out!
Zak...
You want to wind up in the nick with my brother?
No.
No? Then what do you wanna do for a livin’? Stand on a street corner like a prossie? Or wrestle?
Wrestle.
Right. Then cut this crap or I ain’t trainin’ ya. Paulie nods apologetically. Zak softens.
Paulie, you got talent, mate. If you focus and work hard, you could be as good as me.
Can I be as good as Saraya? The question is a gut punch for Zak. He covers.
Sure.
Can I be as good as her, Zak? The other strays begin to echo the sentiment: “Could I be good as Saraya?" “Can I be like her? -- a cacophony in Za head.  55 56 57 58.
(curt) Yes! His bluntness surprises everyone.
(softening) Yes... if you all work at it... so let’s go... come on... Calum resumes his practice.
Rest of you, blow ups, let’s go... The Strays begin BLOW UP DRILLS with renewed vigour. PUSH IN on Zak, as his thoughts churn --

Raya carries a basket from the laundry room. She passes t pool. Kirsten, Madison and Jeri-Lynn are sunbathing, music blar laughing and joking, flirting with a handful of the MALE WRESTLERS. As Raya passes at a distance, she observes the fun -- detached -- distant -- uninvited. She locks eyes with Kirsten -- who flashes her gleaming w teeth, then leans into Jeri-Lynn, whispers something to h Jeri-Lynn laughs, glances at Raya. Throws a smile her way Raya climbs the steps to her apartment. INT. RAYA’S APARTMENT - BEDROOM - NIGHT 56 Raya -- unable to sleep -- cuddles Ultimate Warrior -- st up at the ceiling fan. Rolls over. Looks at the PICTURES her bedside table of her family.
I miss you all so much. INT. RAYA’S APARTMENT - LIVING ROOM - NIGHT 57 Raya is talking with Ricky and Julia on Skype. Ricky is eating a plate of HOTDOGS.  59.
I can’t sleep. I lie awake, wonderin’ what you’re all doing --
We miss you too, darlin’...

You eating healthy like I told you? (stuffing hotdog in his mouth) None of that Yank junk food. You don’t wanna lose your figure. Mustard falls onto his beer gut. Raya looks at her mum and dad, chooses her words carefull
I don’t think I belong here.
What d’ya mean?
I belong with you over there. With the family.
You're over there for the family.
But it’s so lonely here. I got no friends.
Get a cat.
Rick...
I’m not lettin’ you jack it in ‘cause you’re not gettin’ invited to bloody sleepovers.
I thought Zak would be here.
Well he ain’t! He fucked it up, Roy fucked it up, you’re not fuckin’ it up, too.  58 59 60 60.
Ricky -- Raya begins to tear up. Julia looks concerned.
No! Save your tears for the pillow, we ain’t speakin’ to you if you call us cryin’.
(peacemaker ) Ricky... Raya wipes away the tears. Ricky cools off.

Darlin’, when I was livin’ on the streets, I never dreamt I’d have kids, let alone one with the talent to be rich and bloody famous. You can have everythin’ I never had, darlin’. But not if you quit. Raya nods, taking this in.

Just... try and fit in more... Off Raya’s reluctant nod -- INT. RAYA’S APARTMENT - BATHROOM - NIGHT 58 Raya dumps two DRUG-STORE BAGS down on the counter. Takes some BOTTLES -- places them on the counter. Stares at herself in the mirror -- pushes her hand throug her JET BLACK HAIR -- starts to remove her LIP PIERCING. EXT. FLORIDA - pay {| 59 AERIAL SHOT: An NXT-BRANDED COACH speeds down a two-lane highway. INT. NXT TOUR BUS - CONTINUOUS Oo 60 The Class -- guys and girls -- socialize. An NXT-BRANDED COACH rolls along. Jeri-Lynn is muttering Kirsten and a few others. She looks further down the coac follow her gaze to Raya, sitting alone at the back.  61 62 61. She has transformed herself. Fake tan, way too orange -- bottle blonde hair -- bright lipstick -- painted nails -- colorful clothes -- a DIY imitation of the other girls. Jeri-Lynn leans over.
You look unbelievable. Who did your tan?
I did it myself.
No way? What about your make-up?
